education: Instinctive animal behavior, otherwise no formal education
powers: Niels possesses the same kinetically charged powers as Speedball before he became Penance
significantissues: Received his powers in the same manner as Robbie Baldwin and becomes kinetically charged, eludes Robbie’s efforts to catch him (Speedball #1-10, 1988-1989)
Captured by Harlequin Hit Man and Sticker, helps to foil Rebound’s plan with a kinetically powered hairball (New Warriors #66, 1985)
joined Lockjaw in forming the Pet Avengers (Lockjaw and the Pet Avengers #1, 2009)
